data.message: Too bad you can't think for yourself.  Are you really that blind that you can't see all the good President Trump is doing? Such a shame

replies.message:
Oh yeah. How he totally looked out for Puerto Rico and is using tax dollars to go to his resorts and threatened to resort to nuclear warfare with North Korea because he's the best president. Or are you just waiting for him to grab you by the pussy? Maybe you want to trade places with Ivanka, who he admitted on live television he wouldn't mind having sex with..but thats okay with you right? A guy who wants to sleep with his own daughter?

mmkay. You got mad at a 5 minute rap when you should be mad about what Trump has done since becoming president. What the fuck is wrong with you?

Please come up with SOMETHING that's true!! He pays for his own vacations. Unlike Obama and Puerto Rico received more than enough services. Blame the corrupt government over there not Trump. For once we don't have a coward in office and he's not afraid to stand up to fat boy or anyone else. You are a sick stupid troll Matthew Andino come up with SOMETHING original that's not all propaganda!

So you condone it. Thanks, thats all I needed to know to get the bigger picture. You can overlook everything about the sleezebag. You just want the small orange wanger in your mouth. 👄
